data.eml:eml: Review of the species of Ardistomina (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Clivinini) in America north of Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bousquet, Yves (2006): Review of the species of Ardistomina (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Clivinini) in America north of Mexico. Zootaxa 1308: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173802
